content:
Yes, The Berkeley has two Michelin-starred restaurants and one more casual dining option. Here are the details:

- Marcus: A two Michelin-starred restaurant by Chef Marcus Wareing, serving modern British cuisine. - Koffmann's: A one Michelin-starred restaurant by Chef Pierre Koffmann, serving French-inspired cuisine. - The Collins Room: A more casual dining option, serving breakfast, lunch, afternoon tea, and dinner, with a focus on seasonal ingredients and modern British cuisine. In addition to the restaurants, The Berkeley also has a bar and a rooftop terrace where you can enjoy drinks and light bites with a view of the city.
